properties.name: Taj Mahal
properties.description: Ivory-white marble mausoleum, perfect example of Mughal architecture and one of the Seven Wonders

properties.name: Varanasi Ghats
properties.description: Ancient riverside steps on the Ganges, spiritual heart of Hindu pilgrimage

properties.name: Amber Fort (Jaipur)
properties.description: Majestic 16th-century fortress of red sandstone and marble overlooking Maota Lake

properties.name: Mehrangarh Fort (Jodhpur)
properties.description: Colossal clifftop fort rising 125m above the Blue City with panoramic views

properties.name: Golden Temple (Amritsar)
properties.description: Sikhism's holiest shrine covered in gold leaf, home to the world's largest free kitchen

properties.name: Jaisalmer Fort
properties.description: Living desert fort of yellow sandstone where one-quarter of the city's population still resides

properties.name: Kerala Backwaters
properties.description: 900km network of lagoons, canals, and lakes best explored on traditional houseboats

properties.name: Hampi Ruins
properties.description: UNESCO World Heritage ruins of the Vijayanagar Empire amid dramatic boulder-strewn landscape

properties.name: Rann of Kutch
properties.description: Vast seasonal salt marsh creating surreal white plains stretching to the horizon

properties.name: Hawa Mahal (Jaipur)
properties.description: Palace of Winds with its iconic honeycomb facade of 953 small windows

properties.name: City Palace (Udaipur)
properties.description: Largest royal complex in Rajasthan overlooking Lake Pichola
